name: TileReconverter
title: 重建地砖
author: Arcitos
description: 通过这个MOD可以将装饰砖再转换回其基础砖 (例如, 警戒混凝土回到普通混凝土) 来保持库存整齐. 按[J]来重新设置您当前光标持有的堆栈. 可以用于混凝土, 沥青路面MOD, More_Floors MOD等.
description_original: This mod helps keeping your inventory tidy by allowing the reconversion of decorative tiles back to their base tile (e.g. hazard concrete back to plain concrete). Press [J] to reconvert the stack of tiles you are currently holding in your cursor. This works for vanilla concrete, AsphaltRoads, MoreFloors and others.
